name: Nowhere Carnival: Dark Circus
description:
Terror/Mystery short visual novel (right now more like a visual "tale"). 

You were trapped somewhere far away. Everything is weird. You get to escape but it's night and... Is a forest. Why did they bring you here? Think later, there are some monsters screaming. RUN!
Finally, right there is a circus... Nothing can get worse, right?

  • Dark style - german expressionism
  • Terror / Mystery in a strange place 

"Developed" in Figma.  Soon in HTML (JS)!

Art and Narrative: Coralain (Website) | Instagram | Facebook 

Special Thanks!

To all the network jam team for everything, and to my twin who visited me sometimes and bring me some ideas.

Constructive comments are more than welcome! ♥
